A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lazy\, rushed\, cringe-worthy movie. Felt like it was made by children for children. It was just eye-candy. Barely any dialogue (Zack Snyder would be proud). This movie was honestly boring. No romance\, No emotion\, no comedy\, no memorable moments. It felt like a Disney movie. And that's not a good thing. P.S. did Disney pay off all these critics? Because wow I'm shocked it has over a 90% rating...
